## date-time-helpers package

A library of helper functions for date logic

## Functions

|  Function | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [\_formatDateRange(range, formatFn)](./date-time-helpers._formatdaterange.md) | Formats a range of dates to a readable format |
|  [\_formatShortDate(d)](./date-time-helpers._formatshortdate.md) | Formats a date to a short string. Format dd.m.yy. |
|  [\_getDateOfWeek(w, y)](./date-time-helpers._getdateofweek.md) | Get a date that belongs to a specified week and year. |
|  [\_getFirstDayOfMonth(date)](./date-time-helpers._getfirstdayofmonth.md) | Get the first day of a specified month |
|  [\_getFirstDayOfWeek(date)](./date-time-helpers._getfirstdayofweek.md) | Get the first day of a specified week |
|  [\_getFirstDayOfYear(date)](./date-time-helpers._getfirstdayofyear.md) | Get the first day of a specified year |
|  [\_getISO(date)](./date-time-helpers._getiso.md) | Get an ISO date string from a  |
|  [\_getLastDayOfMonth(date)](./date-time-helpers._getlastdayofmonth.md) | Get the last day of a specified month |
|  [\_getLastDayOfWeek(date)](./date-time-helpers._getlastdayofweek.md) | Get the last day of a specified week |
|  [\_getLastDayOfYear(date)](./date-time-helpers._getlastdayofyear.md) | Get the last day of a specified year |
|  [\_getMonthRange(date, getISO)](./date-time-helpers._getmonthrange.md) | Get a date range containing the start and end date of a specified month. |
|  [\_getTotalHours(first, last)](./date-time-helpers._gettotalhours.md) | Get the total hours between two UNIX millisecond timestamps |
|  [\_getUnixTimeSeconds(date)](./date-time-helpers._getunixtimeseconds.md) | Get a UNIX timestamp for a specified date in seconds. |
|  [\_getWeekRange(date, getISO)](./date-time-helpers._getweekrange.md) | Get a date range containing the start and end date of a specified week. |
|  [\_getWeeksInYear(year)](./date-time-helpers._getweeksinyear.md) | Get the number of weeks for a specified year |
|  [\_getWeekYear(date)](./date-time-helpers._getweekyear.md) | Get the week and year of a specified date |
|  [\_getYearRange(date, getISO)](./date-time-helpers._getyearrange.md) | Get a date range containing the start and end date of a specified year. |
|  [\_mergeDateAndTime(date, time)](./date-time-helpers._mergedateandtime.md) | Merge a date value and a time value to a datetime value. |

## Interfaces

|  Interface | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [DateRange](./date-time-helpers.daterange.md) | Represents the range between two specified dates |
|  [WeekYear](./date-time-helpers.weekyear.md) | Represents a week and year |
